summary: CAR SUDDENLY LOOSES POWER AT HIGHWAY SPEED.  DIAGNOSED AS THROTTLE BODY FAILURE AND REPLACED BY DEALER.  FORD COVERS NON HYBRID MODELS WITH REPLACEMENT AT N/C TO OWNERS BUT EXCLUDES HYBRID COVERAGE FOR SAME PART ON SAME ICE ENGINE WITH SAME SYMPTOMS.  SUDDEN LOSS OF POWER AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS IS EXTREMELY DANGEROUS ESP IN URBAN TRAFFIC SITUATION AND THIS SHOULD BE A MANDATORY RECALL.
